conclusion: Analyze the image and understand the flow of liquid through the baffles.
Arrows labeled A, B, C, and D indicate the direction of flow.
Predict which container (E, F, or G) the liquid will flow into after passing through the baffles.
Arrows indicate the direction of flow from A to B, C, and D.
Liquid will flow into the container directly opposite the points A, B, C, and D.
The liquid will flow into container G.
